record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - March 06, 2008)

[Page: H1399]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I was detained in my district on February 28 and March 4 and missed the following rollcall votes:
Rollcall vote No. 90, I would have voted "aye";
Rollcall vote No. 89, I would have voted "aye";
Rollcall vote No. 88, I would have voted "aye";
Rollcall vote No. 87, I would have voted "aye";
Rollcall vote No. 86, I would have voted "aye";
Rollcall vote No. 85, I would have voted "aye."
Today, I was detained as well with the Dialogue on Diversity, and therefore on the Inslee-Sarbanes amendment to H.R. 2857, I would have voted "aye."
